name: Word One - A Word Search Game for Brain Exercise
name_original: Word One - A Word Search Game for Brain Exercise
description:
*From the team of the #1 app "Hi Guess the Movie"*

Brand new 7 letters, 8 letters, and 9 letters packs added! Find the hidden words in those addictive puzzles! Spell out the SPECIFIC ONE WORD in each puzzle! Expand your mind step by step!

--How to play?--
Swipe your fingers over each letter up, down, left, right, diagonally, and even backwards to search words in thousands of well-design puzzles! Seems easy? Hmm… maybe NO! This game will let you think and go crazy! Wanna be a WORD GENIUS? 156 free fantastic packs, 3000 challenging levels with unique gameplay, Word One brings you a new game experience!

--Features--
- FREE for all users
- CASUAL word game for all ages
- STUNNING fresh user interface design
- EXPAND your mind from 4 letters words to 9 letters words.
- EXERCISE your brain wherever you are and whenever you want
- ENHANCE your puzzle solving skill among those puzzles

--Warm Tips--
- USE HINTS: when you are stuck, hints will help you move on
- CONTACT US: If you have any issues, please do not hesitate to contact us by wordone_97_1@histudiosupport.com

**************************************************************************
… More surprise and challenging levels are coming in future versions, please stay tuned!
